name: Flipbike.io
description:
Go and knock down all enemy motorcycles! Dash towards the end!

· Speed Run: Straightforward core game mode, providing you with smooth and realistic racing experience! Ready, set, go!
· Speed Race: Kick your opponents, jump into the air, and dominate the track! You are unstoppable!
· Upgrade Motorbike: Speed up and unlock more appealing new motorbikes! They are faster and can leap a longer distance, literally allowing you to fly!
· Customization: Dozens of customized skins, dazzling effects and gestures are at your choice! Find your own unique style now!

Feature：
-Pick and match all types of skins and special effects
-Simple touch and easy controls
-Real bike race，beat all your enemies!
